text: LittleBe (stylized as little Be) was a British children's preschool television programming block. It was broadcast by ITVBe. The block was launched on 3 September 2018. The block aired from 9:00am to 12:00pm on weekends and weekdays and was aimed at children 2 through 6. LittleBe was removed from the ITVBe schedule with the block airing for the last time on 31 May 2024. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2018 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Television networks *
title: LittleBe
